N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.6 - Resident dining and recreation areas

State Regulations
(a) Resident dining and recreation areas
shall be not less than 30 square feet per certified bed for the first 100
certified beds and 27 square feet per certified bed for all certified beds in
excess of 100. Additional space shall be provided for visitors who participate
in an adult day health care program. (b) Storage space shall be provided for
recreational equipment, within or adjacent to dining room. (c) Toilets for resident use shall be located
within or immediately adjacent to the dining room. Notes
